byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and MATTHEW ROSENBERG

abstract: Lawmakers and military experts criticize Donald Trump for suggesting at presidential candidates' forum hosted by NBC that underlying cause of sexual assault in military is integration of women; many say Trump's statements illuminate his fundamental misunderstanding of history of women in military.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: In defending his suggestion that the integration of women led to assaults, Mr. Trump exposed a faulty understanding of a complex issue and of the military justice system.
snippet: In defending his suggestion that the integration of women led to assaults, Mr. Trump exposed a faulty understanding of a complex issue and of the military justice system....

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Remarks Show He’s Mistaken on Sexual Assault in Military
headline.print_headline: Trump Faulted for His Notions  About Assaults
